Package Flua

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComprehensionGamePanel
    Comprehension game panel class, derived from GamePanel, used by GUI
    ControlPanel
    Panel containing game controls (Main Menu, Dictionary Lookup, Exit, etc)
    Dictionary
    This class provides a dictionary GUI for the Flua reading project.
    Driver
    Driver class to initialize Flua
    FillWordGamePanel
    Fill-a-Word game panel class, derived from GamePanel, used by GUI
    FontManager
    FontManager class to load and initialize a custom font
    Game
    Wrapper class used to differentiate between available game types
    GamePanel
    Parent panel to initialize and manage individual game panels (namely the Control, Word, Resource and Input panels).
    GUI_window
    Manages GUI components
    InputHandler
    Class to handle all user input for the GUI
    InputPanel
    Panel to process user input
    MenuPanel
    Main panel containing controls to begin a new game
    ResourcePanel
    Create a panel to hold the resources required for the game
    WordPanel
    Panel to hold word hints.
